name: PyMongo
body:
The PyMongo integration adds support for PyMongo, the official MongoDB driver. It adds breadcrumbs and performace traces for all queries.

  1. Install sentry-sdk from PyPI with the pymongo extra:
pip install --upgrade 'sentry-sdk[pymongo]'
  1. To configure the SDK, initialize it before creating any of PyMongo's MongoClient instances:
import sentry_sdk
from sentry_sdk.integrations.pymongo import PyMongoIntegration


sentry_sdk.init(
    dsn="___PUBLIC_DSN___",
    integrations=[
        PyMongoIntegration(),
    ],

    # Set traces_sample_rate to 1.0 to capture 100%
    # of transactions for performance monitoring.
    # We recommend adjusting this value in production,
    traces_sample_rate=1.0,
)

The above configuration captures both breadcrumbs and performance data. To reduce the volume of performance data captured, change traces_sample_rate to a value between 0 and 1.
